productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS web_orders_m0 FROM oe_hdr AS h WHERE h.order_date >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1) AND h.order_date < DATEADD(month, 1, DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)) AND ( LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(h.web_shopper_id, N''))) <> N'' OR LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(h.web_shopper_email,N''))) <> N'' OR LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(h.web_reference_no, N''))) <> N'' );
calculationType: Count web orders for the current month

productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS web_orders_m1 FROM oe_hdr AS h WHERE h.order_date >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-1,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-1,GETDATE())), 1) AND h.order_date < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1) AND ( LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(h.web_shopper_id, N''))) <> N'' OR LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(h.web_shopper_email,N''))) <> N'' OR LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(h.web_reference_no, N''))) <> N'' );

SELECT COUNT(*) AS web_orders_m2 FROM oe_hdr AS h WHERE h.order_date >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-2,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-2,GETDATE())), 1) AND h.order_date < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-1,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-1,GETDATE())), 1) AND ( LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(h.web_shopper_id, N''))) <> N'' OR LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(h.web_shopper_email,N''))) <> N'' OR LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(h.web_reference_no, N''))) <> N'' );
